doc: ['Automatic Target Detection from Satellite Imagery Using Machine Learning .', 'Object detection is a vital step in satellite imagery-based computer vision application such as precision agriculture , urban planning and defense application .', 'In satellite imagery , object detection is a very complicated task due to various reason including low pixel resolution of object and detection of small object in the large scale ( a single satellite image taken by Digital Globe com-prises over 240 million pixel ) satellite image .', 'Object detection in satellite image has many challenge such as class variation , multiple object pose , high variance in object size , illumination and a dense background .', 'This study aims to compare the performance of existing deep learning algorithms for object detection in satellite imagery .', 'We created the dataset of satellite imagery to perform object detection using convolutional neural network-based framework such as faster RCNN ( faster region-based convolutional neural network ) , YOLO ( you only look once ) , SSD ( single-shot detector ) and SIMRDWN ( satellite imagery multiscale rapid detection with windowed network ) .', 'In addition to that , we also performed an analysis of these approach in term of accuracy and speed using the developed dataset of satellite imagery .', 'The result showed that SIMRDWN has an accuracy of 97 % on high-resolution image , while Faster RCNN has an accuracy of 95.31 % on the standard resolution ( 1000 × 600 ) .', 'YOLOv3 has an accuracy of 94.20 % on standard resolution ( 416 416 ) while on the other hand SSD has an accuracy of 84.61 % on standard resolution ( 300 × 300 ) .', 'When it comes to speed and efficiency , YOLO is the obvious leader .', 'In real-time surveillance , SIMRDWN fails .', 'When YOLO takes 170 to 190 millisecond to perform a task , SIMRDWN takes 5 to 103 millisecond .', 'Cloud detection using an ensemble of pixel-based machine learning model incorporating unsupervised classification .', 'Remote sensing imagery , such as that provided by the United States Geological Survey ( USGS ) Landsat satellites , has been widely used to study environmental protection , hazard analysis , and urban planning for decade .', 'Cloud are a constant challenge for such imagery and , if not handled correctly , can cause a variety of issue for a wide range of remote sensing analysis .', 'Typically , cloud mask algorithms use the entire image ; in this study we present an ensemble of different pixel-based approach to cloud pixel modeling .', 'Based on four training subset with a selection of different input feature , 12 machine learning model were created .', 'We evaluated these model using the cropped LC8-Biome cloud validation dataset .', 'As a comparison , Fmask was also applied to the cropped scene Biome dataset .', 'One goal of this research is to explore a machine learning modeling approach that uses as small a training data sample as possible but still provides an accurate model .', 'Overall , the model trained on the sample subset ( 1.3 % of the total training sample ) that includes unsupervised Self-Organizing Map classification result as an input feature has the best performance .', 'The approach achieves 98.57 % overall accuracy , 1.18 % cloud omission error , and 0.93 % cloud commission error on the 88 cropped test image .', 'By comparison to Fmask 4.0 , this model improves the accuracy by 10.12 % and reduces the cloud omission error by 6.39 % .', 'Furthermore , using an additional eight independent validation image that were not sampled in model training , the model trained on the second largest subset with an additional five feature has the highest overall accuracy at 86.35 % , with 12.48 % cloud omission error and 7.96 % cloud commission error .', 'This model ’ s overall correctness increased by 3.26 % , and the cloud omission error decreased by 1.28 % compared to Fmask 4.0 .', 'The machine learning cloud classification model discussed in this paper could achieve very good performance utilizing only a small portion of the total training pixel available .', 'We showed that a pixel-based cloud classification model , and that as each scene obviously has unique spectral characteristic , and having a small portion of example pixel from each of the sub-regions in a scene can improve the model accuracy significantly .', 'Comparing three machine learning technique for building extraction from a digital surface model .', 'Automatic building extraction from high-resolution remotely sensed data is a major area of interest for an extensive range of field ( e.g.', ', urban planning , environmental risk management ) but challenging due to urban morphology complexity .', 'Among the different method proposed , the approach based on supervised machine learning ( ML ) achieve the best result .', 'This paper aims to investigate building footprint extraction using only high-resolution raster digital surface model ( DSM ) data by comparing the performance of three different popular supervised ML model on a benchmark dataset .', 'The first two method rely on a histogram of oriented gradient ( HOG ) feature descriptor and a classical ML ( support vector machine ( SVM ) ) or a shallow neural network ( extreme learning machine ( ELM ) ) classifier , and the third model is a fully convolutional network ( FCN ) based on deep learning with transfer learning .', 'Used data were obtained from the International Society for Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing ( ISPRS ) and cover the urban area of Vaihingen an der Enz , Potsdam , and Toronto .', 'The result indicated that performance of model based on shallow ML ( feature extraction and classifier training ) are affected by the urban context investigated ( F1 scores from 0.49 to 0.81 ) , whereas the FCN-based model proved to be the most robust and best-performing method for building extraction from a high-resolution raster DSM ( F1 scores from 0.80 to 0.86 ) .', 'Building Roof Superstructures Classification from Imbalanced and Low Density Airborne LiDAR Point Cloud .', 'Light Detection and Ranging ( LiDAR ) , an active remote sensing technology , is becoming an essential tool for geoinformation extraction and urban planning .', 'Airborne Laser Scanning ( ALS ) point clouds segmentation and accurate classification are challenging and crucial to produce different geo-information product like three-dimensional ( 3D ) city design .', 'This paper introduces an effective data-driven approach to build roof superstructure classification for airborne LiDAR point cloud with very low density and imbalanced class , covering an urban area .', "Notably , it focuses on building roof superstructure ( especially dormer and chimney ) and mitigating nonplanar object ' problem .", 'Also , the imbalanced class problem of LiDAR data , to the best of our knowledge , is not yet addressed in the literature ; it is considered in this study .', 'The major advantage of the proposed approach is using only raw data without assumption on the distribution underlying data .', 'The main methodological novelty of this work are summarized in the following key element .', '( i ) At first , an adapted connected component analysis for 3D point cloud is proposed .', '( ii ) Twelve geometry-based feature are extracted for each component .', '( iii ) A Support Vector Machine ( SVM ) -driven procedure is applied to classify the 3D component .', '( iv ) Furthermore , a new component size-based sampling ( CSBS ) method is proposed to treat the imbalanced data problem and has been compared with several existing resampling strategy .', 'In this study , component are classified into five class : shed and gable dormer , chimney , ground , and others .', 'The result of this investigation show the satisfying classification performance of the proposed approach .', 'Result also showed that the proposed approach outperformed machine learning method , including SVM , Random Forest , Decision Tree , and Adaboost .', 'Assessment of combining convolutional neural network and object based image analysis to land cover classification using sentinel 2 satellite imagery ( Tenes Region , Algeria ) .', 'Land cover map can provide valuable information for various application , such as territorial monitoring , environmental protection , urban planning and climate change prevention .', 'In this purpose , remote sensing based on image classification approaches undergoing a high revolution can be dedicated to land cover mapping task .', 'Similarly , deep learning model are considerably applied in remote sensing application ; which can automatically learn feature from large amount of data .', 'Prevalently , the Convolutional Neural Network ( CNN ) , have been increasingly performed in image classification .', 'The aim of this study is to apply a new approach to analyse land cover , and extract its feature .', 'Experiment carried out on a coastal town located in north-western Algeria ( Ténès region ) .', 'The study area is chosen because of its importance as a part of the national strategy to combat natural hazard , specifically flood .', 'As well as , a simple CNN model with two hidden layer was constructed , combined with an Object-Based Image Analysis ( OBIA ) .', 'In this regard , a Sentinel-2 image was used , to perform the classification , using spectral index combination .', 'Furthermore , to compare the performance of the proposed approach , an OBIA based on machine learning algorithms mainly Random Forest ( RF ) and Support Vector Machine ( SVM ) , was provided .', 'Result of accuracy assessment of classification showed good value in term of Overall accuracy and Kappa Index , which reach to 93.1 % and 0.91 , respectively .', 'As a comparison , CNN-OBIA approach outperformed OBIA based on RF algorithm .', 'Therefore , Final land cover map can be used as a support tool in regional and national decision .', 'Assessment of deep learning technique for land use land cover classification in southern new caledonia .', 'Land use ( LU ) and land cover ( LC ) are two complementary piece of cartographic information used for urban planning and environmental monitoring .', 'In the context of New Caledonia , a biodiversity hotspot , the availability of up-to-date LULC maps is essential to monitor the impact of extreme event such as cyclone and human activity on the environment .', 'With the democratization of satellite data and the development of high-performance deep learning technique , it is possible to create these data automatically .', 'This work aims at determining the best current deep learning configuration ( pixel-wise vs. semantic labelling architecture , data augmentation , image prepos-sessing , … ) , to perform LULC mapping in a complex , subtropical environment .', 'For this purpose , a specific data set based on SPOT6 satellite data was created and made available for the scientific community as an LULC benchmark in a tropical , complex environment using five representative area of New Caledonia labelled by a human operator : four used as training set , and the fifth as a test set .', 'Several architecture were trained and the resulting classification was compared with a state-of-the-art machine learning technique : XGboost .', 'We also assessed the relevance of popular neo-channels derived from the raw observation in the context of deep learning .', 'The deep learning approach showed comparable result to XGboost for LC detection and over-performed it on the LU detection task ( 61.45 % vs. 51.56 % of overall accuracy ) .', 'Finally , adding LC classification output of the dedicated deep learning architecture to the raw channel input significantly improved the overall accuracy of the deep learning LU classification task ( 63.61 % of overall accuracy ) .', 'All the data used in this study are available on line for the remote sensing community and for assessing other LULC detection technique .', 'Machine learning approach to extract building footprint from high-resolution image : The case study of Makkah , Saudi Arabia .', 'Extracting and identifying building boundary from high-resolution image have been a hot topic in the field of remote sensing for year .', 'Various method including geometric , radiometric , object based and edge detection were previously deliberated and implemented in different study in the context of building extraction .', 'Nevertheless , the reliability of extraction process is mainly subject to user intervention .', 'The current study proposes a new automatic morphology-based approach for extracting building using high-resolution satellite image of Al-Hudaybiyah region in the city of Makkah as a case study .', 'The proposed technique integrates the support vector machine for extracting building that have bright and dark roofs .', 'The appropriateness of this method has been examined by mean of various indicator for example completeness , correctness and quality .', 'Preliminary finding will illustrate the precision and accuracy of the used machine learning algorithm .', 'Research result can provide a generic indicator to assist the planning authority in achieving better urban planning processes taking into account all potential environmental , social and urban demand and requirement .', 'Published by Oxford University Press .', 'A refined method of high-resolution remote sensing change detection based on machine learning for newly constructed building area .', 'Automatic detection of newly constructed building area ( NCBAs ) plays an important role in addressing issue of ecological environment monitoring , urban management , and urban planning .', 'Compared with low-and-middle resolution remote sensing image , high-resolution remote sensing image are superior in spatial resolution and display of refined spatial detail .', 'Yet its problem of spectral heterogeneity and complexity have impeded research of change detection for high-resolution remote sensing image .', 'As generalized machine learning ( including deep learning ) technology proceed , the efficiency and accuracy of recognition for ground-object in remote sensing have been substantially improved , providing a new solution for change detection of high-resolution remote sensing image .', 'To this end , this study proposes a refined NCBAs detection method consisting of four part based on generalized machine learning : ( 1 ) pre-processing ; ( 2 ) candidate NCBAs are obtained by mean of bi-temporal building mask acquired by deep learning semantic segmentation , and then registered one by one ; ( 3 ) rule and support vector machine ( SVM ) are jointly adopted for classification of NCBAs with high , medium and low confidence ; and ( 4 ) the final vector of NCBAs are obtained by post-processing .', 'In addition , area-based and pixel-based method are adopted for accuracy assessment .', 'Firstly , the proposed method is applied to three group of GF1 image covering the urban fringe area of Jinan , whose experimental result are divided into three category : high , high-medium , and high-medium-low confidence .', 'The result show that NCBAs of high confidence share the highest F1 score and the best overall effect .', 'Therefore , only NCBAs of high confidence are considered to be the final detection result by this method .', 'Specifically , in NCBAs detection for three group GF1 image in Jinan , the mean Recall of area-based and pixel-based assessment method reach around 77 % and 91 % , respectively , the mean Pixel Accuracy ( PA ) 88 % and 92 % , and the mean F1 82 % and 91 % , confirming the effectiveness of this method on GF1 .', 'Similarly , the proposed method is applied to two group of ZY302 image in Xi ’ an and Kunming .', 'The score of F1 for two group of ZY302 image are also above 90 % respectively , confirming the effectiveness of this method on ZY302 .', 'It can be concluded that adoption of area registration improves registration efficiency , and the joint use of prior rule and SVM classifier with probability feature could avoid over and missing detection for NCBAs .', 'In practical application , this method is contributive to automatic NCBAs detection from high-resolution remote sensing image .', 'Fusion of airborne total world population by 2050 .', 'In the face of challenge brought about by the demographic transition , there is an urgent need to improve the accuracy of urban land-use mapping to more efficiently inform about urban planning process .', 'Decision-makers rely on accurate urban mapping to properly assess current plan and to develop new one .', 'This study investigates the effect of including conventional spectral signature acquired by different sensor on the classification of airborne LiDAR ( Light Detection and Ranging ) point cloud using multiple feature space .', 'The proposed method applied three machine learning algorithms—ML ( Maximum Likelihood ) , SVM ( Support Vector Machines ) , and MLP ( Multilayer Perceptron Neural Network ) —to classify LiDAR point clouds of a residential urban area after being geo-registered to aerial photo .', 'The overall classification accuracy passed 97 % , with height as the only geometric feature in the classifying space .', 'Misclassifications occurred among different class due to independent acquisition of aerial and LiDAR data as well as shadow and orthorectification problem from aerial image .', 'Nevertheless , the outcome are promising as they surpassed those achieved with large geometric feature space and are encouraging since the approach is computationally reasonable and integrates radiometric property from affordable sensor .', 'Use of deep learning model in street-level image to classify one-story unreinforced masonry building based on roof diaphragms .', 'In this paper , we explore the potential of convolutional neural network to classify street-level imagery of one-story unreinforced masonry building ( MURs ) according to the flexibility of the roof diaphragm ( rigid or flexible ) .', 'This information is critical for vulnerability study , disaster risk assessment , disaster management strategy , etc.', ', and is of great relevance in city where unreinforced masonry is the most common building typology or where the majority of the population resides in such building .', 'Our contribution could be useful for local government of city in developing country seeking to significantly reduce the number of death caused by disaster .', 'Our research result indicate that VGG19 is the convolutional neural network architecture with the best performance , with an accuracy of 0.80 , a precision of 0.88 , and a recall of 0.84 .', 'The result are encouraging and could be used to reduce the amount of resource ( both human and economic ) for the development of detailed exposure model for unreinforced masonry building .', 'Transfer Learning Models for Land Cover and Land Use Classification in Remote Sensing Image .', 'Land Cover or Land Use ( LCLU ) classification is an important , challenging problem in remote sensing ( RS ) image .', 'RS image classification is a recent technology used to extract hidden information from remotely sensed image in the observed earth environment .', 'This classification is essential for sustainable development in agricultural decision and urban planning using deep learning ( DL ) method .', 'DL gets more attention for accuracy and performance improvement in large datasets .', 'This paper is aimed to apply one of the DL method called transfer learning ( TL ) .', 'TL is the recent research problem in machine learning and DL approach for image classification .', 'DL consumes much time for training when starting from scratch .', 'This problem could be overcome in the TL modeling technique , which uses pre-trained model to build deep TL model efficiently .', 'We applied the TL model using bottleneck feature extraction from the pre-trained model : InceptionV3 , Resnet50V2 , and VGG19 to LCLU classification in the UC Merced dataset .', 'With these experiment , the TL model has been built the outdate performance of 92.46 , 94.38 , and 99.64 in Resnet50V2 , InceptionV3 , and VGG19 , respectively .', 'Published with license by Taylor & development of infrastructure is proceeding rapidly in this region .', 'The objective of this research is to obtain building data by mean of automated extraction from Pléiades satellite image .', 'This is due to the need for efficient mapping and updating of geodatabases for urban planning and touristic development .', 'It compares the performance of random forest algorithm to other classifier like maximum likelihood , support vector machine , and backpropagation neural network over the well-organized building which appeared in the satellite image .', 'Image were subsequently classified into two class : building and non-buildings .', 'In addition , basic morphological operation such as opening and closing were used to enhance the smoothness and connectedness of the classified imagery .', 'The overall accuracy for random forest , maximum likelihood , support vector machine , and backpropagation were 97 % , 95 % , 93 % and 92 % respectively .', 'It was found that random forest was algorithms for object detection and extraction from very high-resolution image .', 'Development of a Methodology for Complex Monitoring of the Development of Urban and Suburban Areas Based on the Intellectual Analysis of Earth Remote Sensing Data and Geospatial Technologies .', 'Over the past half century , mankind is increasingly faced with the problem of rational use of the Earth ’ s territory and its resource without negative impact on the environment and the person himself .', 'The organization of human life activity requires solving the issue of urban planning and the correct distribution of zone for the construction of industrial facility , recreation , waste disposal zone , communication , route , etc .', 'Balanced planning is based on monitoring the current state of infrastructure and territory .', 'This article proposes a methodology for integrated monitoring of the development of urban and suburban area .', 'It is proposed to use Earth remote sensing data as a basis for the study .', 'The issue of collection , integration and intelligent processing of satellite image are considered .', 'The definition and segmentation of object in image to create digital map is performed based on machine learning algorithms .', 'Urban tree specie classification using UAV-based multi-sensor data fusion and machine learning .', 'Urban tree specie classification is a challenging task due to spectral and spatial diversity within an urban environment .', 'Unmanned aerial vehicle ( UAV ) platform and small-sensor technology are rapidly evolving , presenting the opportunity for a comprehensive multi-sensor remote sensing approach for urban tree classification .', 'The objective of this paper were to develop a multi-sensor data fusion technique for urban tree specie classification with limited training sample .', 'To that end , UAV-based multispectral , hyperspectral , LiDAR , and thermal infrared imagery was collected over an urban study area to test the classification of 96 individual tree from seven specie using a data fusion approach .', 'Two supervised machine learning classifier , Random Forest ( RF ) and Support Vector Machine ( SVM ) , were investigated for their capacity to incorporate highly dimensional and diverse datasets from multiple sensor .', 'When using hyperspectral-derived spectral feature with RF , the fusion of all feature extracted from all sensor type ( spectral , LiDAR , thermal ) achieved the highest overall classification accuracy ( OA ) of 83.3 % and kappa of 0.80 .', 'Despite multispectral reflectance band alone producing significantly lower OA of 55.2 % compared to 70.2 % with minimum noise fraction ( MNF ) transformed hyperspectral reflectance band , the full dataset combination ( spectral , LiDAR , thermal ) with multispectral-derived spectral feature achieved an OA of 81.3 % and kappa of 0.77 using RF .', 'Comparison of the feature extracted from individual sensor for each specie highlight the ability for each sensor to identify distinguishable characteristic between specie to aid classification .', 'The result demonstrate the potential for a high-resolution multi-sensor data fusion approach for classifying individual tree by specie in a complex urban environment under limited sampling requirement .', 'Estimating Socio-Economic Parameter via Machine Learning Methods Using Luojia1-01 Nighttime Light Remotely Sensed Image at Multiple Scales of China in 2018 .', 'Mapping socio-economic indicator with a raster format is still a great challenge .', 'The nighttime light ( NTL ) datasets have been widely utilized to estimate the socio-economic parameter .', 'However , the precision of the published datasets was too coarse to meet related issue such as flood loss assessment , urban planning , and epidemiological study .', 'The present study calibrated gross domestic product ( GDP ) , population ( POP ) , electric consumption ( EC ) , and urban build-up area ( B-A ) at 100 m resolution for 45 city of China in 2018 using Luojia1-01 NTL datasets via random forest ( RF ) as well as geographically weighted regression ( GWR ) model .', 'The linear regression ( LR ) , back propagation neural network ( BPNN ) , and support vector machine ( SVM ) method were selected for comparison with GWR and RF model .', 'Besides , the Suomi National Polar-Orbiting Partnership-Visible Infrared Imaging Radiometer Suite ( NPP-VIIRS ) was chosen for comparison with Luojia1-01 .', 'The ten-folded cross-validation ( CV ) has been used for evaluating accuracy at county and city scale .', 'Finally , the distribution map of socio-economic parameter were illustrated and some finding were obtained .', 'First , the validation result revealed that the calibration at the city-scale outperformed the county or district scale .', 'Second , the precision of the Luojia1-01 NTL dataset surpassed the NPP-VIIRS NTL dataset on the same administrative scale except for some specific situation .', 'Third , the precision of the simulation for the gross domestic product ( GDP ) is the highest than the others , followed by electric consumption ( EC ) , build-up area ( B-A ) , and population ( POP ) .', 'Fourth , the optimum model varied according to the socio-economic parameter .', 'Fifth , the distribution of socio-economic parameter exhibited obvious spatial heterogeneity .', 'This paper can supply scientific support for calibrating socio-economic parameter in other region .', 'Synthesizing location semantics from street view image to improve urban land-use classification .', 'Land-use map are instrumental to inform urban planning and environmental research .', 'Street view image ( SVIs ) have shown great potential for automated land-use classification for land-use mapping .', 'However , previous study overlooked SVI-derived location contextual information that may help improve land-use classification .', 'This study proposes a novel land-use classification method that synthesizes location semantics from SVIs to account for contextual information from SVIs , land parcel and road around the SVIs .', 'The proposed method first generates land-use scene image ( LUSIs ) by using an SVI-derived straightforward algorithm .', 'The LUSIs are then relocated to land parcel by using a displacement strategy and classified into land-use type by using a deep learning network .', 'This study determines the land-use type of land parcel with classified LUSIs .', 'Two case study , consisting of LUSIs for five land-use type , show that introducing location semantics of SVIs can remarkably improve the classification accuracy of land-use type .', 'Urban population distribution mapping with multisource geospatial data based on zonal strategy .', 'Mapping population distribution at fine resolution with high accuracy is crucial to urban planning and management .', 'This paper takes Guangzhou city as the study area , illustrates the gridded population distribution map by using machine learning method based on zoning strategy with multisource geospatial data such as night light remote sensing data , point of interest data , land use data , and so on .', 'The street-level accuracy evaluation result show that the proposed approach achieved good overall accuracy , with determinant coefficient ( R2 ) being 0.713 and root mean square error ( RMSE ) being 5512.9 .', 'Meanwhile , the goodness of fit for single linear regression ( LR ) model and random forest ( RF ) regression model are 0.0039 and 0.605 , respectively .', 'For dense area , the accuracy of the random forest model is better than the linear regression model , while for sparse area , the accuracy of the linear regression model is better than the random forest model .', 'The result indicated that the proposed method has great potential in fine-scale population mapping .', 'Therefore , it is advised that the zonal modeling strategy should be the primary choice for solving regional difference in the population distribution mapping research .', 'A NOVEL SELF-TAUGHT LEARNING FRAMEWORK USING SPATIAL PYRAMID MATCHING for SCENE CLASSIFICATION .', 'Remote sensing earth observation image have a wide range of application in area like urban planning , agriculture , environment monitoring , etc .', 'While the industrial world benefit from availability of high resolution earth observation image since recent year , interpreting such image has become more challenging than ever .', 'Among many machine learning based method that have worked out successfully in remote sensing scene classification , spatial pyramid matching using sparse coding ( ScSPM ) is a classical model that has achieved promising classification accuracy on many benchmark data set .', 'ScSPM is a three-stage algorithm , composed of dictionary learning , sparse representation and classification .', 'It is generally believed that in the dictionary learning stage , although unsupervised , one should use the same data set as classification stage to get good result .', 'However , recent study in transfer learning suggest that it might be a better strategy to train the dictionary on a larger data set different from the one to classify .', 'In our work , we propose an algorithm that combines ScSPM with self-taught learning , a transfer learning framework that trains a dictionary on an unlabeled data set and uses it for multiple classification task .', 'In the experiment , we learn the dictionary on Caltech-101 data set , and classify two remote sensing scene image data set : UC Merced LandUse data set and Changping data set .', 'Experimental result show that the classification accuracy of proposed method is compatible to that of ScSPM .', 'Our work thus provides a new way to reduce resource cost in learning a remote sensing scene image classifier .', 'A robust segmentation framework for closely packed building from airborne LiDAR point cloud .', 'Urban village ( UVs ) are commonly found in many Asian city .', 'These village contain many closely packed building constructed decade ago without proper urban planning .', 'There is a need for those building to be identified and put into statistic .', 'In this paper , we present a segmentation framework that invokes multiple machine learning technique and point cloud/image processing algorithm to segment individual closely packed building from large urban scene .', 'The presented framework consists of two major segmentation process .', 'The framework first filters out the non-ground object from the point cloud , then it classified them by using the Random Forest classifier to isolate building from the entire scene .', 'After that , the building point clouds will be segmented based on several building attribute analysis method .', 'This is followed by using the Random Sample Consensus ( RANSAC ) plane filtering method to expand the space between two closely packed building , so that the Density-Based Spatial Clustering of Applications with Noise ( DBSCAN ) clustering technique can be used to more accurately segment each individual building from the closely packed building area .', 'Two airborne Light Detection and Ranging ( LiDAR ) datasets collected in two different city with some typical closely packed building were used to verify the proposed framework .', 'The result show that the framework can effectively identify the closely packed building with unified structure from large airborne LiDAR datasets .', 'The overall segmentation accuracy reaches 84 % for the two datasets .', 'The proposed framework can serve as a basis for analysis and segmentation of closely packed building with a more complicated structure .', 'Comparative assessment of machine learning method for urban vegetation mapping using multitemporal Sentinel-1 imagery .', 'Mapping of green vegetation in urban area using remote sensing technique can be used as a tool for integrated spatial planning to deal with urban challenge .', 'In this context , multitemporal ( MT ) synthetic aperture radar ( SAR ) data have not been equally investigated , as compared to optical satellite data .', vegetation was classified using six classifiers-random forest ( RF ) , support vector machine ( SVM ) , extreme gradient boosting ( XGB ) , multi-layer perceptron ( MLP ) , AdaBoost .', 'M1 ( AB ) , and extreme learning machine ( ELM ) .', 'Whereas , SVM showed the best performance in the single-date image analysis , the MLP classifier yielded the highest overall accuracy in the MT classification scenario .', 'Mean overall accuracy ( OA ) value for all machine learning method increased from 57 % to 77 % with speckle filtering .', 'Using MT SAR data , i.e.', ', three and five S1 imagery , an additional increase in the OA of 8.59 % and 13.66 % occurred , respectively .', 'Additionally , using three and five S1 imagery for classification , the F1 measure for forest and low vegetation land-cover class exceeded 90 % .', 'This research allowed us to confirm the possibility of MT C-band SAR imagery for urban vegetation mapping .', 'Regional mapping of essential urban land use category in China : A segmentation-based approach .', 'Understanding distribution of urban land use is of great importance for urban planning , decision support , and resource allocation .', 'The first mapping result of essential urban land use category ( EULUC ) in China for 2018 have been recently released .', 'However , such kind of national map may not sufficiently meet the growing demand for regional analysis .', 'To address this shortcoming , here we proposed a segmentation-based framework named EULUC-seg to improve the mapping result of EULUC at the city scale .', 'An object-based segmentation approach was first applied to generate the basic mapping unit within urban parcel .', 'Multiple feature derived from high-resolution remotely sensed and social sensing data were updated and then recalculated within each unit .', 'Random forest was adopted as the machine learning algorithm for classifying urban land use into five Level I class and twelve Level II class .', 'Finally , an accuracy assessment was carried out based on a collection of manually interpreted sample .', 'Result showed that our derived map achieved an overall accuracy of 87.58 % for Level I , and 73.53 % for Level II .', 'The accurate and refined map of EULUC-seg is expected to better support various application in the future .', 'Land cover classification based on machine learning using UAV multi-spectral image .', 'Land cover classification using UAV multi-spectral image is of great significance in precision agriculture , urban planning , land use and other field .', 'However , traditional remote sensing image classification method can not meet the classification accuracy requirement of UAV multi-spectral image .', 'This paper aims to propose an object-based machine learning classification method to improve the land over classification accuracy of UAV multi-spectral image .', 'The experimental area is a standard test field located in the Jilin Province of China .', 'The experimental data was captured by a UAV equipped with a multi-spectral camera which includes four band from 550 nm to 790 nm .', 'First , the original image were preprocessed and the spectral curve of land cover were analyzed , thus four kind of land cover with large difference were selected as category .', 'Then pixel-based , boosting-based and object-based machine learning method were used for classification .', 'The object-based classification method could make full use of the spatial and spectral information , and eliminate the noise problem caused by the high resolution of the UAV image to a certain extent .', 'Finally , accuracy analysis using the verification image showed that the RF-O method achieved the highest classification accuracy of 92.2419 % , and the kappa coefficient was 0.8904 .', 'All result indicate that the object-based machine learning classification method proposed in this paper is more suitable for the research of land cover classification , comparing with the traditional remote sensing image classification method , and performs well on the land cover classification of UAV multi-spectral image .', 'Remote sensing and GIS approach for environmental green
